Articles.Content: Ok so I am making some new parts for HL Airships and I have run into an issue with the node setup. I have the nodes placed where I want them but now the part won't turn green when I put it on. The nodes snap together but it won't turn solid or attach.

The vector it's trying to attach with could be wrong? I just about always screw that up first time anyway.

Or if there are more than two nodes, only the last two nodes (as defined in the cfg) will work properly

The vector it's trying to attach with could be wrong? I just about always screw that up first time anyway.

Or if there are more than two nodes, only the last two nodes (as defined in the cfg) will work properly

Really? Odd...

I did eventually get a 6-way hub working alright by making sure the part orientation was upright (according to the x=90 KSP uses) and defining the top/bottom nodes last in the .cfg

The four side nodes then worked alright, but sometimes (depending on what you're trying to attach) they won't seem to work until the Top and Bottom nodes are populated
